description: Member of any organization or group (binary)
notes: W2 only. Binary yes/no question

description: Number of formal groups belong to
notes: W1-W2 only. Count variable 0-3

description: Number of private groups belong to
notes: W1 only. Count variable 0-3

description: First most important organization belong to
notes: W2 has 20 categories. W3-W6 have 21 categories. Categories mostly align

description: Second most important organization
notes: W2 has 20 categories. W3-W6 have 21 categories

description: Third most important organization
notes: W2 has 20 categories. W3-W6 have 21 categories

description: Most actively participated organization in past 12 months
notes: W5-W6 only. Same 21 categories

description: Most people can be trusted (binary/trichotomous)
notes: W1 has 3 options (both/it depends). W2-W4 binary. W5-W6 add it depends

description: Most people are trustworthy (agree scale)
notes: W3-W6 only. 1=Strongly agree to 4=Strongly disagree. Need reversal

description: People try to take advantage vs be fair
notes: W4 only. Binary choice question

description: Trust in relatives
notes: W2-W6. W2-W4 (1=none→4=great deal) HIGHER=MORE. W5-W6 (1=fully→6=distrust) HIGHER=LESS. Must reverse W5-W6

description: Trust in neighbors
notes: W2-W6. W2-W4 (1=none→4=great deal) HIGHER=MORE. W5-W6 (1=fully→6=distrust) HIGHER=LESS. Must reverse W5-W6

description: Trust in people you interact with
notes: W2-W6. W2-W4 (1=none→4=great deal) HIGHER=MORE. W5-W6 (1=fully→6=distrust) HIGHER=LESS. Must reverse W5-W6

description: Trust in people you meet for the first time
notes: W2-W3 and W5-W6. Missing W4. W2-W3 (1=none→4=great deal) HIGHER=MORE. W5-W6 (1=fully→6=distrust) HIGHER=LESS. Must reverse W5-W6

description: Number of people contacted in typical weekday
notes: W2-W6. Five categories from 0-4 people to 50+ people

description: Social status of most contacts (higher/lower/equal)
notes: W5-W6 only. Three categories comparing social status

description: Political views similarity of frequent contacts
notes: W5-W6 only. Six categories from all similar to don't know their views

description: Can ask people for help with difficult problems
notes: W3-W6. Four point scale from nobody to a lot of people

description: Other people come to you for help
notes: W3-W4 only. Four point scale from nobody to a lot of people

description: Difficulty conversing with those with different political views
notes: W2-W6. Four point from very hard to not hard at all. Higher=more tolerant so reverse code
